title: Looking for silver/ gold MID and TOP laner for flex team
body:
Our mid and top had to quit. looking for top laner with large champion pool, and a mid with good mechanics. Thanks.
Must have a working mic and be willing to use it.

replies.body: I would be interested in playing top lane for y'all, some mid if needed. What is yalls schedule like?

> [{quoted}](name=cbabythawiz,realm=NA,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=67M8dLE3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-18T21:55:19.397+0000)
>
> I would be interested in playing top lane for y'all, some mid if needed. What is yalls schedule like?

You play on NA, this team is based in OCE
